OTHER PRESENT:
THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON
07.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING:

Crl1.M.C.No.5799 of 2019 > 2020/KER/427
ORDER
Dated this the 7th day of January 2020

The petitioners are accused in ยง$.C.No.716/2011 on
the file of the Additional Sessions Court-IV,
Thrissur, for having allegedly committed the offences
punishable under Sections 452, 324, 326, 307 read
with Section 34 of I.P.C. The defacto complainant-
injured is the 2" respondent herein, who has appeared
through a Counsel and has filed an affidavit stating
that the matter has been amicably settled and he has
no existing grievance against the petitioners. A
report has been filed by the investigating officer
through the Senior Public Prosecutor to that effect.
The petitioners do not have any criminal antecedents
and no public interest is involved. The injury
sustained by the defacto complainant is not life-
threatening.

In the result, the Crl.M.C. is allowed and the
entire proceedings in S.C.No.716/2011 on the file of
